getMouseClick() - Method in class hsa2.GraphicsConsole
Returns non-zero if the mouse has been clicked since the last time the click was queried, zero if the mouse was not clicked.

GraphicsConsole - Class in hsa2
This is a re-implementation of the old hsa console by Holt Software Associates.
